QuestData.Title: Tavernkeeper's Fate
QuestData.Description: I have finished unraveling Ly'leth's message.$b$bI want you to come with me to her estate. It is long past time I returned to the city.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Thalyssra to the Lunastre Estate and learn of Vanthir's fate.
QuestData.RewardText: We need to take action immediately!

Objectives.Objective: Take the Portal to Lunastre Estate
